column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Went to Bavette's with my wife and my Dad while in Chicago. The food is wonderful. I love steak
column2: but can't digest it as well like I used to so I had the lamb chops. Man
column3: meaty & delicious. My wife and my dad had the salmon and it was great. Our waiter
column5: was amazing and gave us excellent service. Well done!!
